awd_titl_txt: Group Travel for U.S. Participants in the XXIV InteramericanCongress of Psychology; Santiago, Chile; July 4-9, 1993
awd_abstract_narration: ABSTRACT                                                                                                                                                                                                            This action is to help defray the costs of American scientists                  who are attending an international meeting.  The meeting is the                 XXIV Interamerican Congress of Psychology which will bring                      together American and South American behavioral and social                      scientists for the purpose of interacting in meaningful                         scientific dialogue.  The meeting provides opportunities for                    these scientists to share their research experiences as well as a               chance to initiate collaborations amoung and between scientists of              diverse nations.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Behavioral and Cognitive Sciences
